ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 6D 20.2 MP Full-Frame CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body Brand New USA w/ All Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II SLR Lens Brand New USA w/Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital High Speed Memory Card + LP-E6 Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement Battery
58mm 0.45x Wide Angle Lens w/ Pouch and Caps + 58mm 2x Telephoto Lens W/ Pouch and Caps
58mm Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, FLD, CPL + External Digital Slave SLR Flash
